snippet: The interactive game show is taking over nearly two weeks of NBC’s schedule in September.
abstract: Ryan Seacrest will be host of NBC interactive prime-time game show The Million Second Quiz.
lead_paragraph: The interactive game show is taking over nearly two weeks of NBC’s schedule in September.

headline.main: NBC Taps Seacrest to Host ‘The Million Second Quiz’
headline.print_headline: Seacrest to Host a New Game Show on NBC
